Question: Ambient Photonics, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ambient Photonics, Inc.

Low-Light Indoor Solar Cells

- Pioneers of low-light, indoor solar cell technology for everyday electronics
- Developed a unique dye-sensitized solar cell (DSSC) capable of delivering up to 3X more power than other indoor solar solutions in low-light conditions
- Solar cells designed to replace heavier, thicker batteries, allowing for sleeker products with minimal carbon impact
- Cells demonstrate three times better light harvesting efficiency than conventional solutions
- Unveiled the first bifacial solar cell, capable of harvesting light energy from both the back and front of the solar cell simultaneously
- Already shipping cells to device manufacturers and integrating them into a range of smart home devices
- First large-scale shipment of indoor low-light cells made in Fall 2023 from a state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in California
- Plans to break ground on a second U.S.-based smart manufacturing facility in 2025 to meet growing demand
